alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 10 at 10:19PM PST until November 11 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...A portion of the San Joaquin Valley * WHEN...From 2 AM PST tonight until 9 AM PST Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 152, Highway 180, Highway 99 north of Kern County, and Highway 198 from Visalia to Lemoore.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
